# VEHICLE::GET_VEHICLE_ACCELERATION

## Summary
Get the maximum drive force this vehicle (with mods) can apply to the ground. This isn't particularly accurate and should be used as a guide and referenced with top speed.

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicleIndex: Vehicle of interest

## Returns
* **FLOAT**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
static - max acceleration
